Items: <Item name="ULTRA Mark VII" identifier="ULTRA Mark VII" category="Equipment" tags="provocative,divingsuit" scale="0.5" fireproof="true" description="Mark VII armour, also known as the “Aquila,” “Imperator”, “Eagle” armour[1] or “Armorum Impetor”, was developed during the Horus Heresy, and remains in use as one of the most common form of power armour ten thousand years later. It represents the final major development of Mark VI armour.>
